body.name: Nivea Men Sensitive Face Wash with Vitamin E, Chamomile and Witch Hazel Extracts, 5 Fl Oz Tube
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 29 - March 7 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Formulated for Sensitive Skin: NIVEA MEN Face Wash is specially formulated for men with sensitive skin
Soap and Dye Free: This cleansing face wash for sensitive skin is soap free and dye free with no drying alcohol
Gently Cleanses: NIVEA MEN sensitive skin face wash gently cleanses to remove impurities and excess oil for visibly healthy-looking skin
Vitamin E and Chamomile Enriched: NIVEA for men face wash enriched with Vitamin E, soothing Chamomile and Witch Hazel extracts
Includes one (1) 5 fluid ounce tube of NIVEA MEN Sensitive Face Wash
body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Face Wash. This moisturizing face wash is specially formulated for men with sensitive skin. NIVEA Sensitive Face Wash for Men is enriched with Vitamin E, soothing Chamomile and Witch Hazel extracts to calm and soothe skin. This sensitive face cleanser gently cleanses to remove impurities and excess oils to leave skin looking clean and healthy while feeling fresh and comfortable. You can feel good about using this NIVEA face wash for men since it is soap free and dye free with no drying alcohol, making it a safe facial cleanser for everyday use. A daily face wash is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Face Moisturizer, Sensitive Shave Gel and Post Shave Balm as part of a daily skincare regimen. To use, lather NIVEA men's face wash, massage over wet face, and rinse off with water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely fantastic product
reviews.reviewText: From the very first use, this product has been absolutely fantastic. It helps with the sensitivity on my skin and does not oversaturate, nor under hydrate my skin first product in a long time I found that works and sticks to its word.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for my Son
reviews.reviewText: Great facial wash for young men and adult men. I see improvement with his skin. This is a great product to start your teenager with. I wanted my son to start a facial routine and he enjoys using this. I paired it with the moisturizer as a follow up to the wash, and he loves. It also smells great, has a light scent not overbearing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Will get again
reviews.reviewText: Very gentle on my face and doesn't dry out my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and recommended.
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well, does not dry, effective product that does what it promises....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband and son LOVE this product!
reviews.reviewText: If you are someone with sensitive skin, this product is GREAT! Both my husband and son have very fair skin and they both use this product regularly. They love the smell and that it leaves their skin soft without any redness or burning to the face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good product, no irritability and provides moisture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin but design flaw is irritating
reviews.reviewText: So this face wash is great for sensitive skin. My face is very sensitive and this face wash works great. There’s only one negative and that’s the cap. The little plastic piece that fits inside hole that the soap comes out of breaks easily. When it breaks it get stuck inside in dispensing hole. You’ll need pliers to get it out. I’ve had several of these delivered with that piece already broken!So if you drop this in the shower expect to not be able to get the soap out. Unless you’re like me and say screw it and walk butt naked with shampoo in your hair still out to the garage to find some pliers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have used over 10 years and it is the best (for me)
reviews.reviewText: As stated above, I've used this product for over 10 years. It used to come fragrance free but I guess some whiny "men" (there are so many of you out there) wanted some fragrance in the product. Admittedly, before the fragrance it did feel weird applying an odorless gel to my face but the results are all that matter to me. I couldn't find it for about a year or more until it finally reappeared again with the fragrance. This product cleans the best and does not cause any further breakouts. I have sensitive + combination type skin which is very acne prone if not cared for specifically. I forgot to pack this face wash on vacation with me for a week and used Cetaphil gentle skin cleanser and boom, instant whiteheads and even a couple milia on my eyelids, which have never come up in the past ten years.Use this product and buy lots of it. I never want this to be discontinued if I can help it. I can't speak on the ingredients and fragrance causing problems and irritation with other users, but it does not affect my skin negatively. Like I said, I have acne prone skin even at my age. Only this face wash and some Glycolix skin care products do not break me out.
Usage wise .looks a very good item.. as it's just one month I can't say about the results ..

Este producto no crea nada de espuma, no me gustó la sensación ya que parece que no estás lavando nada, igual y es porque está diseñado para pieles demasiado sensibles pero sentí que no me limpia nada, es como frotar un gel medio plástico en la cara y ya.
WORST PLEASE DO NOT BUY IT WASTE OF MONEY
